Translations.Text: Ara asamana amara ta nirmana karechi amadera ksamata bale [1] ebam amara niscaya'i mahasamprasaranakari
Ara yamina, amara take bichiye diyechi, atahpara kata sundara byabasthapanakari [1] (amara)
ara pratyeka bastu amara srsti karechi joraya joraya [1], yate tomara upadesa grahana kara
Ata'eba, tomara allahara dike dhabita ha'o [1]. Niscaya ami tomadera prati allahara paksa theke eka spasta satarkakari
Ara tomara allahara sathe kono ilah‌ sthira karo na; ami tomadera prati allaha prerita eka spasta satarkakari
Ebhabe tadera purbabatidera kache yakhana'i kono rasula esechena tara'i take baleche, ’e to eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada!’
Tara ki eke aparake e mantrana'i diye eseche? Baram era simalajayanakari sampradaya
Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna, ete apani tiraskrta habena na
Ara apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana niscaya upadesa muminadera upakare ase
Ara ami srsti karechi jina ebam manusake ejan'ye'i ye, tara kebala amara ibadata karabe
Ami tadera kacha theke kono riyika ca'i na ebam eta'o ca'i na ye, tara amake kha'oyabe
Niscaya allaha, tini'i to riyikadata, prabala saktidhara, parakramasali
Sutaram yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera samamatabalambidera anurupa prapya (sasti). Kaje'i tara etara jan'ya amara kache yena tarahuro na kare
Ata'eba, yara kuphari kareche tadera jan'ya durbhoga se dinera, ye dinera bisaye taderake satarka kara hayeche
